Condition_summary_1: Sediment and erosion control measures must be in place and maintained to avoid sediment entering the NSR during all project phases.
Condition_summary_2: Fish screens must meet requirements of 0.125 m/s intake flow with 7,045 m² of total screen area to prevent entrainment.
Condition_summary_3: Installation of a gravel/cobble bar (5,800 m²) to offset habitat loss, using rounded stone 15–150 mm in diameter.
Condition_summary_4: Monitoring and reporting requirements include post-construction surveys, embeddedness surveys, and functional monitoring over three years.
Fish_species: None explicitly listed in section 4 or elsewhere
